headline: Hilton increases stock buyback program by $3.5 billion
summary: Hilton Worldwide (HLT) said on Thursday it had authorized the repurchase of an additional $3.5 billion worth of common stock under the hotel giant's existing repurchase program.

headline: Hilton Increases Stock Repurchase Authorization
summary: MCLEAN, Va., November 14, 2024--The Board of Directors of Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc. (NYSE: HLT) today authorized the repurchase of an additional $3.5 billion of common stock under the Company's existing stock repurchase program, bringing the total amount currently authorized for future repurchases to approximately $4.8 billion.
